values.content:
={{ "Rank these LinkedIn contacts for job outreach:

Job: " + $json.currentJob.position + " at " + $json.currentJob.company + "
Location: " + $json.currentJob.location + "

Contacts:
" + JSON.stringify($json.employees.map((e, i) => ({
  id: i,
  name: e.fullName || e.name,
  headline: e.headline || e.position || e.title,
  location: e.location,
  score: e.score,
  role: e.role
}))) + "

Return ONLY JSON array (no markdown):
[{"id": 0, "finalScore": 95, "reasoning": "Brief why"}]" }}
